channel.title: NMS:HON on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:HON on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Honeywell’s Solstice Unit Raises $2 Billion Ahead of Spinoff
item.description: The specialty-materials business of Honeywell International Inc. that the conglomerate is in the process of spinning off raised $2 billion in the junk-bond and leveraged-loan markets.

item.title: Honeywell’s Solstice Unit Raises $2 Billion Ahead of Spinoff
item.description: The specialty-materials business of Honeywell International Inc. that the conglomerate is in the process of spinning off raised $2 billion in the junk-bond and leveraged-loan markets.

item.title: Quantinuum Weighs Raising Funds at $10 Billion Valuation
item.description: Honeywell International Inc. and other backers of Quantinuum are considering raising money for the quantum computing firm at a valuation of around $10 billion, people familiar with the matter said.

item.title: Quantinuum Weighs Raising Funds at $10 Billion Valuation
item.description: Honeywell International Inc. and other backers of Quantinuum are considering raising money for the quantum computing firm at a valuation of around $10 billion, people familiar with the matter said.
